===Etymology===
From [[小]] (''shō'', "small," "little") + [[数]] (''sū'', "number")

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しょうすう|kyu=小數}}

# [[decimal fraction]], [[decimal]], [[fraction]]

====Compounds====
* [[小数点]] (''shōsūten''): decimal point
* [[循環小数]] (''junkan shōsū''): recurring decimal
* [[無限小数]] (''mugen shōsū''): infinite decimals
* [[浮動小数点]] (''fudō shōsūten''): floating point representation
* [[浮動小数点演算機構]] (''fudō shōsūten enzan kikō''): floating-point arithmetic unit
